meanings.sent1: The preoperative instructions included fasting before the surgery.
meanings.sent2: The hospital staff prepared the preoperative room for the upcoming operation.
meanings.sent3: The preoperative checklist made sure everything was in place before the surgery.
meanings.sent4: Her nerves felt like a preoperative waiting room, filled with anticipation and uncertainty.
meanings.sent5: The preoperative briefing made the procedure seem more real and imminent.

meanings.definition: relating to the period before a surgical operation
meanings.sent1: The preoperative consultation answered all her questions about the surgery.
meanings.sent2: The preoperative tests confirmed that the patient was ready for the operation.
meanings.sent3: The preoperative paperwork seemed never-ending, like a maze of forms.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a preoperative whirlwind of thoughts and concerns before the surgery.
meanings.sent5: The preoperative waiting area was filled with a mix of anxiety and hope.
